[[Image:Icon-Whirled_Tour.png|left]][[Image:Whirled_Tour.png|right|frame|The Whirled Tour icon bar is added to your row of icons.]]The '''Whirled Tour''' can be accessed by clicking on the icon in your [[Rooms tab]].  After you click on the Whirled Tour, you'll be taken to a [[room]] and a Whirled Tour window will popup in the middle of your Whirled browser.  You can click to go to the ''next room'' on the tour, click on the stars to rate the room, use the [[comment]] icon to leave a comment for the room you're currently in, or click on the X to leave the tour.
